meanings.definition: Relating to or involving measurement of electric current.
meanings.sent1: The amperometric device helped in determining the flow of electricity.
meanings.sent2: The scientist used an amperometric sensor to analyze the current in the circuit.
meanings.sent3: The amperometric tool seemed to have a magical ability to reveal the strength of the electrical flow.
meanings.sent4: Her amperometric skills were so sharp, she could almost see the electrons moving.
meanings.sent5: The amperometric measurement was as clear as a bright beam of light, showing the exact current passing through.

meanings.definition: Of or relating to an amperometer.
meanings.sent1: The amperometric display on the device showed the current readings.
meanings.sent2: An amperometric reading indicated the power consumption of the appliance.
meanings.sent3: The amperometric gauge on the machine looked like a tiny clock counting the electricity.
meanings.sent4: His amperometric knowledge was like having a special key to unlock the secrets of electrical devices.
meanings.sent5: The amperometric display glowed brightly, revealing the energy usage with precision.

meanings.sent1: The amperometric was used to determine the exact amperes flowing through the wire.
meanings.sent2: An accurate amperometric reading helped in preventing electrical overloads.
meanings.sent3: The amperometric device hummed softly as it calculated the amperes passing by.
meanings.sent4: In the world of electricity, the amperometric was the silent hero measuring the power.
meanings.sent5: The amperometric reading displayed the amperes in bold numbers, making it easy to understand the current flow.
